discourse_list.title: Feedback for EIP-1559: Major Dapps / "heavy gas users"

content.content: @timbeiko is gathering feedback from the community to understand needs, impacts, and constraints relating to EIP-1559. In the spirit of this I created this thread for public posting from stakeholders at the major dapps, but definitely reach out to him directly as well.   twitter.com    Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth (TimBeiko)  First bunch is heavy gas users, as per @ETHGasStation 🔥  @UniswapProtocol, @Tether_to, Nest Protocol, @1inchExchange, @chainlink, CHI token, @synthetix_io, @centre_io/@circlepay (USDC), @idexio, @CurveFinance, @KyberNetwork, @AaveAave, @0xProject, @argentHQ, and @BalancerLabs Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth @TimBeikoGiven that at the end of the day, most usage of Ethereum is either done by major projects (Uniswap, tether, etc.) or via certain tooling (exchanges, wallets, etc.), those are the folks for which we need to gauge "implementation likeliness".    10:53 AM - 7 Sep 2020     1
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post, Tim Beiko, is asking for feedback from the community regarding EIP-1559. The post specifically targets stakeholders at major dapps and encourages them to reach out to Tim directly. The purpose of the feedback is to understand the needs, impacts, and constraints relating to EIP-1559.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
